author: .dheeraj
content:
Hello, Good day everyone!
Dheeraj from India. I'm currently working as a backend developer. I basically work with Java, Python, Javascript and C++. 
Also have practical knowledge about Solidity and created few DAPP's by following the online courses like CryptoZomibies. Now I want to give my best in improving the core Ethereum protocol by whatever way I can. Going through the yellow paper, it is way too complex but finding my way through by referring few other resources.  Good luck everyone!üëç

content: True or False there is a maximum of 256 possible OP codes in the EVM?

content: I believe this is true per the current design, but would be interested in how this could be expanded
